Um belo jogo do gênero FPS (First Person Shooter) com um estilo de game-play simples, direta e completa.
Recomendo fortemente pra quem se inicia no gênero e pra quem busca aprender a fundo e  jogar competitivamente.

This is a 21 year old game that has servers that cant go one game without booting people off of it. Valve cant imagine spending any of their money to give us 128 tick servers so half my shots dont even register and on top of that puts me in the same server as people with mental disabilities. Imagine being able to play a game that doesnt make you want to blow your brains out because if you are playing counter strike then you wont be able to.
Bis auf das Problem mit den vielen Smurfs super
